00042 Table::Table(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_manager_ptr, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr, std::string name) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_comm(conn_manager_ptr->get_comm()), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_manager_ptr), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace_ptr) {

00055 Table::Table(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr, std::string name) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_comm(comm), m_conn_manager_ptr(0), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace_ptr) {

00066 void Table::initialize(std::string &name) {
00067   int error;
00068   std::string tableFile = (std::string)"/hypertable/tables/" + name;
00069   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00070   uint64_t handle;
00071   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00072   std::string errMsg;
00073 
00077   m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(true);
00078   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tableFile, OPEN_FLAG_READ, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00079     m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00080     if (error == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00081       throw Exception(Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST);
00082     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace table file '%s' - %s", tableFile.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00083     throw Exception(error);
00084   }
00085   m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00086 
00087   {
00088     char *table_name = new char [ strlen(name.c_str()) + 1 ];
00089     strcpy(table_name, name.c_str());
00090     m_table.name = table_name;
00091   }
00092 
00096   value_buf.clear();
00097   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf)) != Error::OK) {
00098     HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'table_id' for table file '%s' - %s", tableFile.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00099     throw Exception(error);
00100   }
00101 
00102   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00103 
00104   // TODO: fix me!
00105   memcpy(&m_table.id, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00106 
00110   value_buf.clear();
00111   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", value_buf)) != Error::OK) {
00112     HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'schema' for table file '%s' - %s", tableFile.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00113     throw Exception(error);
00114   }
00115 
00116   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00117 
00118   m_schema_ptr = Schema::new_instance((const char *)value_buf.base, strlen((const char *)value_buf.base), true);
00119 
00120   if (!m_schema_ptr->is_valid()) {
00121     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", m_schema_ptr->get_error_string());
00122     throw Exception(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00123   }
00124 
00125   m_table.generation = m_schema_ptr->get_generation();
00126 
00127 }

00129 Table::~Table() {
00130   delete [] m_table.name;

00135 TableMutator *Table::create_mutator(int timeout) {
00136   return new TableMutator(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr, timeout);
00137 }
